entry.title: BitMail.sf.net - encrypted p2p email
entry.summary: The Doctor, a developer of Project Byzantium, made an error in a message on 08/13/2013 04:46 PM, where he mixed up BitMail with BitMessage. BitMail is a different software from BitMessage and can be found at http://bitmail.sf.net. The Doctor's PGP key is 0x807B17C1 / 7960 1CDC 85C9 0B63 8D9F DD89 3BD8 FF2B 807B 17C1, and his website is https://drwho.virtadpt.net/. The Doctor's message has a GPG signature using version 2.0.20 of GnuPG for verification.
